item.title: My Mac SE/30 Is Back Alive
item.description: Or how I fixed my Mac SE/30 that was not booting unexpectedly One day around a year ago I was playing with my SE/30 (the best looking computer ever) and I was trying to install Debian on it for fun. But after inserting some floppies and trying to boot from them the computer wouldn’t turn back on. I mean it would turn on but with weird static graphics and no sound at startup.
